settings.subheading: Giving back to PNW Wild Lands
settings.title: One jewel at a time
settings.text: At VMFJ, we're dedicated to making a difference for the planet. That's why 1% of profits is donated to organizations like Conservation Northwest, a local non-profit protecting wildlands and supporting wildlife in the PNW. Sparkle consciously while positively impacting wildlife.

"As far back as I can remember, I've always enjoyed being with nature. So much so that I received my degree in Environmental Science & Resource Management from the University of Washington so that I dedicate my life to saving wildlife. Obviously, life can change but what you have in your heart does not and I will always stand up for wildlife. Growing up here in Seattle, I am blessed to call the PNW home and if you're from here or have visited, you understand just how precious our surroundings are.

I firmly believe that we all share the responsibility to contribute to the protection of our environment for the well-being of future generations. Here at my company, we are committed to being conscientious stewards of the planet, ensuring that every decision we make considers its environmental impact. Together, we can collaborate to diminish our environmental footprint and pave the way for a more sustainable future."

-Valerie
